strapiPost.title: J.B. Hunt Deepens Partnership With U Of A
strapiPost.content:
The nationally recognized supply chain program of the U of A’s Walton College of Business has officially been renamed the J.B. Hunt Transport Department of Supply Chain Management. 

  • Strengthening ties: J.B. Hunt committed $1.5m to the college to help develop the program that now bears its name, further exemplifying the company’s commitment to advancing innovative, supply-chain focused initiatives. Since 2017, J.B. Hunt has given $7m to the school. 
  • Carrying forward: During the announcement, J.B. Hunt President, Shelley Simpson, said the partnership would “help us achieve our mission of creating the most efficient transportation network in North America, and ultimately the world.”
